type.description:
## Sprinting

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/sprinting).

Sets the entity to sprint.

Type ID: `apugli:sprinting`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:sprinting"
}
```

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Sprinting (Power Type) date: 2023-11-11

Sprinting

Power Type.

Sets the entity to sprint.

Type ID: apugli:sprinting

Fields

requires_input | Boolean | false | Whether a player requires forward input (double tap forward key/use sprint key) to sprint.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:sprinting"
}
